qas.question: In all the different CSP systems, concentrated sunlight is used to heat what?
What do Concentrating Solar Power systems use?

answers.text: lenses or mirrors and tracking systems

qas.question: What is the heat generated from a Concentrating Solar Power system used for?

answers.text: a heat source for a conventional power plant

qas.question: What is one of the most developed Concentrating Solar Power technologies?
What do Concentrating Solar Power technologies have in common?

answers.text: a working fluid is heated by the concentrated sunlight
